titleStmt.title: The western rebel; or, The true UUhiggish standard set up by the true-blue Protestant perkin. To the tune of, Packington's pound.

notesStmt.note: Verse - "See the vizor's pull'd off, and the zelots are arming,".
At foot of text: This may be printed, R.L.S.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
